pkgmetadata.longdescription: MultiLinear Algebra // A set of tools for basic tensor operators. A tensor in the context of data analysis in a multidimensional array. The tools in this package rely on using any discrete transformation (e.g. Fast Fourier Transform (FFT)). Standard tools included are the Eigenvalue decomposition of a tensor, the QR decomposition and LU decomposition. Other functionality includes the inverse of a tensor and the transpose of a symmetric tensor. Functionality in the package is outlined in Kernfeld et al. (2015) https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/ar ticle/pii/S0024379515004358.
